message: You are absolutely Incorrect!!! I would NEVER protest one of those places!!! Why would I want to intentionally want to make someone feel worse than they already do??? While I am anti-abortion when it comes to murdering innocent babies because they are an inconvenience doesn't mean that I sit here and judge every woman that walks through a PP door. I am just against abortion. I can dislike the lap band procedure and not dislike the patient or Dr. doing the procedure. However, as wrong as it may be, you have judged me by my beliefs and I have judged you by yours! I would've been less like to have if I hadn't been talked to like I was some kind of Republican Nazi (I am NOT republican. I am an independent and even voted for Obama his first go around!!!) This whole discussion started with gun control. And, my personal opinion about it. You can disagree with me ALL. DAY. LONG. And I will calmly sit and listen. But DO NOT expect me to calmly sit and listen when I'm being cussed at like a sailor. That really DOES show the decline of our nations moral character. We can agree to disagree. But cursing at me only shows me that you have nothing tangible or relevant for me to understand. I've known WAY too many illiterate people who use vulgar language to make themselves look 'smart'. Therefore, I don't accept that cussing is a sign of intelligence. I have an ex-brother-in-law that was absolutely stupid who used his vulgar mouth to verbally abuse my sister so I have NO USE for people who use vulgarity to belittle or bully anyone.
WeThePeople kept this gang there for 8 years, go figure

This breaks my heart and brings me to tears. The misery this poor animal must be in. What is wrong with society that they think this is okay?
I don't know where the world is heading to?
Then vote out the demarcates like Obama that have been running your state!!!
The sad thing is supported the war in Iraq. Shows how fickle and short a memory Simon Heffer has. He's passing the buck to try and let his employer off the hook.

Once again the law has not caught up with the march of technology. As with any other time this has happened, the proper course of action is for the manufacturers to sue, the media to hit the legislators right in their public opinion, and everyone else to just do what they want and wait for the rules to catch up to the times.
